channel.title: Comments on: Official Campaign Trailer
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: FarCryFanCaesar
item.dc:creator: FarCryFanCaesar
item.description: Just when I thought I was out, they pull me back in!!
item.content:encoded: Just when I thought I was out, they pull me back in!!

item.title: By: _borT
item.dc:creator: _borT
item.description:
Wondering what that electric effect is that you can see being used on a zombie is around 1:30.
Thought maybe stun gun but it looked like a common.
item.content:encoded:
Wondering what that electric effect is that you can see being used on a zombie is around 1:30.

Thought maybe stun gun but it looked like a common.

item.title: By: DocB4B
item.dc:creator: DocB4B
item.description: I love it! This just ramped up the hype 10 fold for me
item.content:encoded: I love it! This just ramped up the hype 10 fold for me

item.title: By: noice_nups
item.dc:creator: noice_nups
item.description:
(Ogre drops down through the roof.)
Fck, my life is over.
item.content:encoded:
(Ogre drops down through the roof.)

Fck, my life is over.

item.title: By: BasicArcher8
item.dc:creator: BasicArcher8
item.description: Yay! We're getting an actual story!

item.title: By: guy121
item.dc:creator: guy121
item.description: I haven't been excited for a game in a long time. I mostly only play coop games these days and I'm hyped.
item.content:encoded: I haven’t been excited for a game in a long time. I mostly only play coop games these days and I’m hyped.

item.title: By: azsori
item.dc:creator: azsori
item.description: I think I saw zombies in riot gear
